text: The 'Volkswagen Polo Mk5 is the fifth generation of the small car Volkswagen Polo. It succeeded the Mk4 in 2009. The platform of the Mk5 Polo was also used for the Audi A1 and the SEAT Ibiza. It was facelifted in 2014. == Engines == * 1.2 12V 44 kW (60 hp) and 51 kW (70 hp) * 1.2 TSI 77 kW (105 hp) * 1.4 16V 63 kW (86 hp) * 1.4 GTI 132 kW (180 hp) * 1.2 TDI 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.6 TDI 55 kW (75 hp), 66 kW (90 hp) and 77 kW (105 hp) Polo Mk5 Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Volkswagen Polo Mk5
